property.description: Each bit represents one character in the Synergy part number, where the MSB is the first character in the part number ('R'). Set bits to ensure the part number in the MCU factory flash matches the part number in the SSP MCU Information. The default mask checks everything except operating temperature, software ID, and quality ID.
